      • search

        public com.dotcms.enterprise.publishing.sitesearch.SiteSearchResults search(java.lang.String query,
                                                                   int start,
                                                                   int rows)
                                                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Performs a search on the default site search index using the current host in the request Sample usage from velocity: 
         #set($searchresults = $sitesearch.search("dotcms",0,10))
 #set($hitsdetail = $searchresults.getDetails())
 #set($summaries = $searchresults.getSummaries())
 #foreach ($i in [0..$math.sub($searchresults.getEnd(),1)])
    $hitsdetail.get($i).getValue("title")
    $hitsdetail.get($i).getValue("url")
    $summaries.get($i).toHtml(true)
 #end
        Parameters:
        query - String to search for
        start - Start row
        rows - Number of rows to return (10 by default)
        Returns:
        DotSearchResults
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
